section_title:
11i03 - Inspection of
goods in interstate commerce.
text:
Employees engaged in
the inspection of goods during the time that they are moving in interstate
commerce are engaged in interstate commerce. This applies not only to
inspections that occur during the actual movement in interstate commerce, but
also to those that are made in connection with the commencement or termination
of the interstate movement. For example, inspections made by employees of a
wholesaler receiving goods from outside the State who check the goods prior to
the time they come to rest within the State are individually covered.
html: Employees engaged in the inspection of goods during the time that they are moving in interstate commerce are engaged in interstate commerce. This applies not only to inspections that occur during the actual movement in interstate commerce, but also to those that are made in connection with the commencement or termination of the interstate movement. For example, inspections made by employees of a wholesaler receiving goods from outside the State who check the goods prior to the time they come to rest within the State are individually covered.
